portfolio.title: Burger App
description: Created a responsive Burger Builder app using ReactJS and Firebase.
Features: Dynamic burger customization, user authentication, order history.
Skills: Front-end, React components, Firebase authentication, responsive UI.
Impact: Strengthened front-end skills, real-world React application.
Future: Planning to enhance user profiles and online ordering.

portfolio.title: Gym Website

Expansion: Future plans include integrating online class booking and payments.
